良久.definition: a good while; a long time

良圖.definition: good plan; right strategy; to take one's time forming the right decision

良家女子.definition: woman from a respectable family; respectable woman

良工心苦.definition: expert craft from hard practice (idiom); hard-won skill; A masterpiece demands suffering.

良師益友.definition: good teacher and helpful friend (idiom); mentor

良心喂狗.definition: to have fed one's conscience to the dogs (idiom); devoid of conscience

良心未泯.definition: not totally heartless; still having a shred of conscience

良性.definition: positive (in its effect); leading to good consequences; virtuous; (medicine) benign (tumor etc)

良慶.definition: Liangqing District of Nanning City 南寧市|南宁市[Nan2 ning2 Shi4], Guangxi

良慶區.definition: Liangqing District of Nanning City 南寧市|南宁市[Nan2 ning2 Shi4], Guangxi

良方.definition: good medicine; effective prescription; fig. good plan; effective strategy

良材.definition: good timber; sound material; fig. able person; sound chap

良機.definition: a good chance; a golden opportunity

良民.definition: good people; ordinary people (i.e. not the lowest class)

良渚.definition: Liangzhu (c. 3400-2250 BC), neolithic culture of Changjiang delta

良渚文化.definition: Liangzhu (c. 3400-2250 BC), neolithic culture of Changjiang delta

良知.definition: innate sense of right and wrong; conscience; bosom friend

良知良能.definition: instinctive understanding, esp. of ethical issues (idiom); untrained, but with an inborn sense of right and wrong; innate moral sense

良禽擇木.definition: a fine bird chooses a tree to nest in (proverb); fig. a talented person chooses a patron of integrity

良禽擇木而棲.pinyin: liáng qín zé mù ér qī
良禽擇木而棲.definition: a fine bird chooses a tree to nest in (proverb); fig. a talented person chooses a patron of integrity

良緣.definition: good karma; opportune connection with marriage partner

良苦用心.definition: to ponder earnestly; to give a lot of thought to sth

良藥.definition: good medicine; panacea; fig. a good solution; a good remedy (e.g. to a social problem)

良藥苦口.definition: good medicine tastes bitter (idiom); fig. frank criticism is hard to swallow

良辰吉日.definition: fine time, lucky day (idiom); fig. good opportunity

良辰美景.definition: fine time, beautiful scenery (idiom); everything lovely
